Event: ... Homelessness in September, scarcity of basic necessities like water, deaths due to bombings and mass shootings, and personal struggles with depression and helplessness.
Post: "As I lay here tonight, surrounded by nothing but the cold hard ground and the endless stars above, I can't help but wonder if this is all my fault. Maybe I should have worked harder, been more careful, or simply made better choices. The thought of not having a place to call home, of struggling to find even the most basic necessities, it all feels so overwhelming and isolating. But deep down, I know that's not the truth. The truth is, life can be cruel and unfair, and sometimes bad things happen to good people. But instead of letting that consume me, I'll hold on to hope and the belief that a better tomorrow is possible." #homelessness #struggle #resilience
